divs: sighting detailsit was the day after the remnants of hurricane ivan came through central pa,possibly 2 days after.i was sitting in my sisters hottub alone,looking up at the stars towards the east.there was no moon and the skies were mostly clear.the disc stopped over a nearby ridge apprx 1\2mile or less from my location.it was dull red with no other lights.i knew instantly what i was seeing,because i watch and read everything i can about ufos.i felt the dull red was the heat of the craft from going through the atmosphere very fast.the size is hard for me to determine since i couldnt be sure of the altitude,but i estimate at least 1\4 mile in diameter.the craft was larger then the largest full moon,when its on the horizon.it stopped on top of the ridge for 15 or 20 seconds,then accelerated from a dead stop due west faster that i could turn my head to follow. i lost sight of it when it went over the house.there was no sound. as a christian i clearly remember feeling that i was meant to see it and at that instant i doubted all my beliefs in god,etc.that feeling only lasted a second,then that feeling went away.personally i believe they are half human and half fallen angel hybrids and they have been here for possibly millions of years.(ephesians-6-12)(revelation-16-13)through the bible evil spirits seem to want to inhabit living creatures.we have the account of jesus casting out demons from a man and the demons asked if they could go into a herd of swine.they did and the pigs ran headlong off of a cliff into the sea and drowned.i know most people desperately want to believe the beings are from outer space and they have good intentions for man.maybe,but we cant count out any possibilities.the next time you are abducted,mention the name of jesus and see how they react.(my date in the info is probably wrong,but could be checked, by checking weather records for hurricane ivan)
Summary: huge disc glowing dull red,no flashing lights
